task_name: Backend: Implement core transformation engine with Jint
resource_notes: Requires deep C# expertise and experience with scripting engine integration. Security implications are high.
alternative_approach: Evaluate other JS engines, but Jint is a hard requirement.
risk_factors: Performance bottlenecks in Jint with large payloads. Security misconfiguration of the sandbox.
mitigation_strategy: Implement performance benchmarks early (REQ-PERF-DTR-002). Rigorous security code review.

task_name: Backend: Secure Jint engine with a configurable sandbox
resource_notes: Critical security task. Requires expertise in sandboxing and preventing code-injection attacks.
risk_factors: A vulnerability in the sandbox could lead to RCE. Jint library might have undiscovered vulnerabilities.
mitigation_strategy: Penetration testing, least-privilege service account, aggressive monitoring, and logging.

task_name: Backend: Implement CRUD API for transformation scripts
resource_notes: Standard API development. Requires collaboration with frontend on API contract.
risk_factors: Inconsistent API design compared to other system APIs.
mitigation_strategy: Define API contract in OpenAPI first. Code review by team lead.

task_name: Frontend: Implement Script Management UI with Monaco Editor
resource_notes: Monaco Editor integration is complex and can impact build configuration and performance.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler editor like CodeMirror, but with feature trade-offs.
risk_factors: Integration complexity can cause timeline delays. Performance issues with the editor on large scripts.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate a technical spike for a PoC. Follow official integration guides.

resource_notes: Requires transactional database logic for versioning and a complex UI for diffing and history.
alternative_approach: Simplified history view without visual diffing to reduce complexity.
risk_factors: Data integrity issues if versioning transactions are not atomic. UI complexity for the diff viewer.
mitigation_strategy: Use a mature diff-viewer library. Enforce transactional integrity in the backend service layer.

resource_notes: Requires knowledge of compliance requirements. Focus on data immutability and retention policies.
alternative_approach: Use an external logging service that guarantees compliance.
risk_factors: Failure to achieve true immutability could lead to compliance failure.
mitigation_strategy: Architectural review with a compliance expert. Use append-only database permissions if possible.
